1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Yudhistir Sikarwar aka Yudh (Amitabh Bachchan) is the owner of Shanti Constructions in Ghaziabad. He is suffering from a neurological disorder that no one knows about. While on his way to office, he notices a flyover and calls the commissioner (Kay Kay Menon) to say that the flyover would fall in approximately 10 years. He also says that he would leak it to the press. Anand (Zakir Hussain), Yudh's best friend and Mona (Mona Wasu), Yudh's PRO advise Yudh against it. But Yudh doesn't change his mind. Menawhile, Nayantara (Ayesha Raza), Yudh's second wife says Yudh to ...

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Yudh tries in vain to talk to Nayan about his disease. Later he encounters a mysterious joker who reveals a secret about Rishi.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Yudh wins the bid for coal mining despite the Commissioner's machinations. However, his reputation receives a further blow when the CD proving him innocent is rumored to be fake. At the same time, his newly set up mining operation receives Naxalite threats. Yudh finds his secret benefactor, but he proves to be unhelpful. Will Yudh be able to prove his innocence and protect his reputation?

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Nikhil is shocked as Yudh reveals his secret affair with Mamta. Anuj fumes in anger as Mamta Malik gets murdered. Yudh insults News Head Mukesh Chhabaria as he blames Yudh for Mamta Malik's murder. Anand comes up with an interesting plan to persuade News Head Mukesh Chhabaria. Will Mukesh get convinced? What will be Mukesh's next move?

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Taruni is shocked to know about Yudh's illness. Yudh feels uneasy and faints. Dr. Mehra who was on his way to Yudh's office meets with an accident. Meanwhile, Taruni rushes for Yudh's rescue but this apparently does not go down too well with Nayantara. Yudh's file gets stolen. Who killed Dr. Mehra? Who is keeping an eye on Yudh's movements?

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Dr. Mehra's Son gives a statement to Police and Media which apparently does not go down too well with Yudh and he asks Anand to keep a watch on Dr. Mehra's Son. Taruni insists Yudh to urgently call a Press Conference and reveal the secret about his illness.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Yudh appoints Taruni as the new CEO of Shanti Constructions but this apparently does not go down too well with Nayan. Mona reveals a shocking truth to Anand. Dharmendra Malik gives final warning to Yudh. Yudh's Son Rishi who was managing Mining work gets kidnapped. Who kidnapped Rishi?

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Naxalites demand Rs. 20 cores for releasing Yudh's Son Rishi from the Jungle. Yudh firmly decides to agree to their demands and also plays a brilliant game. Rishi somehow manages to escape from the jungle with the help of Kids. A blast occurs in Mining area. Will Yudh land in deep trouble?

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Taruni insists Yudh not to drag her in his Business world as she is happy serving people as a Doctor in a Hospital. Yudh rushes to mining area as he gets to know about strike and also promises his workers to do best for them and their Families. What will be Taruni's final decision? Will Minister agree?

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Mona rushes to rescue Smriti who lands in deep trouble. Minister gives final warning to Yudh. Worker's Village is set on fire and Taruni rushes to save the Girl who was half burnt. Yudh is once again attacked by the same Clown. Will Taruni succeed in saving the Girl? Who set the Village on fire?

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Mona files a missing complaint of Smrity and Kapil gets arrested. Kapil gives Mona's laptop which had secret documents to Dharmendra Malik. Rishi returns to work and requests his Father Yudh to give him one chance to prove his potential. Taruni and Rishi are supporting Yudh. Will Yudh come to know about Mona's problem?

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: One of the informers reporting to Devraj meets Rishi and requests him to return back to Mumbai. Mona is shocked as she comes to know that Dharmendra Malik's Lawyer is helping Kapil. Anand gets arrested. How will Mona find out the truth?

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Rishi meets Home Minister to supply more electricity to the mining area. Anand gets caught by Police in the Agent's House. Anand lands in deep trouble as Police finds a Shirt and broken teeth in his Car. Yudh is once again attacked by the same Clown. Massive fight takes place between Yudh and Clown. Will Home Minister agree?

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: A shocking incident occurs with Nayan in the mining area. Nayan gets shot and is urgently admitted to the Hospital. Nayan's condition is critical and Yudh convinces Taruni to operate Nayan. Ranjan gets angry with his team who were supposed to kidnap Rishi.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Despite of having no knowledge in surgery, Taruni takes a huge risk of operating Yudh's Wife Nayan. Nayan's condition is critical. Rishi fumes in anger and also meets Home Minister to find out the truth behind the shooting incident. What will happen when Rishi and Yudh will come to know that Nayan's Brother Ranjan is involved in the planning? Will Taruni's surgery prove to be a successful one?

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Yudh gets angry with Rishi as one of the Villagers gives a shocking statement in media about Rishi. Mona is shocked to know that the Housekeeper that she was looking for is killed and also insists her to tell Anand to surrender to Police.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Anand's Wife reveals to him that he has always ignored his Family and has given more importance to Yudh and his Family. Massive argument takes place between Yudh and Anand as Yudh decides to appoint Rishi as the CEO of Shanti Constructions. Anand joins hands with Yudh's enemies. Will Yudh land in deep trouble?

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Dharmendra Malik and Nikhil get to know about Anand's fall out and also tries to convince him to enter in his troop to destroy Yudh and Shanti Constructions. Anand agrees but only on one condition that he would like to meet his 3rd Partner. Anand is shocked to meet their 3rd Partner. Who killed Dharmendra Malik?

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Anand reveals a shocking truth to Yudh about Aju. The nurse, working for Anand ties up his wife and hands over a machine gun to his son who is mentally disturbed. The boy plays around with the gun, he isn't aware of the consequences of his actions. Taruni gets kidnapped. Will Yudh succeed in releasing his Daughter Taruni?

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Anand gets severely injured while saving his Son Aditya. Ajju kidnaps Taruni and also calls Rishi and Yudh. Ajju gives a deadly task to Rishi and on the other side, massive fight of life and death takes place between Yudh and Ajju. Will Yudh succeed in saving his Daughter Taruni?

imdb.title: Yudh
plot: Principled but hard-driving businessman _Yudh_ (qv)isthir Sikarwar works to expand his empire whilst keeping an explosive secret.::Varun
